!Warehouse Keeper Wilford: Welcome to the Iron Gate! For 30 adena per item, we will take safe care of your possessions. But enough pleasantries. What do you think? A bargain, no? Well, if you have doubts, it s all right if you try us out a few times before you make your decision to entrust us completely with your goods.
